title: Die Dreigroschenoper - Weill Brecht - Ute Lemper 1990 - mp3
description:
Die Dreigroschenoper - Weill Brecht - Ute Lemper 1990 - mp3

Kurt Weill and Bertold Brecht - Die Dreigroschenoper (The Threepenny Opera) with Ute Lemper, in German.  Also features  Milva, Helga Dernesch, RenÃƒÂ© Kollo, Rolf Boysen, Mario Adorf. RIAS Berlin Sinfonietta, John Mauceri.  Recorded in 1990 by Decca.

I was so impressed by the amount of interest in my last Die Dreigroschenoper torrent that I thought that I would post another version.  If you wanted the version with Lotte Lenya from 1958, it is here: <a href="

Enjoy!
